#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define endl '\n'

int gcd(int a, int b){
    return (a%b==0?b:gcd(b, a%b));
}

int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    
    int t,x1,x2,y1,y2,a,b;
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--){
    	cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
    	
    	a = abs(x1-x2);
    	b = abs(y1-y2);
    	
    	if(a==0 || b==0){
    	    cout << 0 << endl;
    	}else{
    	    cout << (a + b - gcd(a,b)) << endl;
    	}
    }
    
    return 0;
}
